title: A Miserable merry Christmas
creator_credit: Glenn Jordan, Bo Goldman and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents an account of an episode from the life of Lincoln Steffens which helps stimulate thought on the spirit and values of Christmas. Suitable for primary level.
